title: Moonchildren
description: When Quaid first sees Alika staring out from a window in a creepy old house, he knows she isn't like anyone else he's ever met. He's right - Alika is different. Maybe that's why her parents don't want her seeing him. They are a little weird...And things are about to get weirder. Those who are weak and vulnerable are disappearing all over town only to be discovered later savagely murdered.
author: Andrew  Matthews
